title: You've Cat To Be Kitten Me

replies.body: That leona is just. . . .Why can't I have that beautiful cat? T-T

cause you need to praise the sun more

Hollow Leona skin confirmed for the next Harrowing.

hate to be reminded that it'll take years for me to have a next-gen console to play DS3
no work no mahney no ds3
Can I have the cat sir? I praise the sun quite often.
Art thou grossly incandescent?

Incoming in 3.... 2.... 1....

Agreement has landed.
I was going to say "This one is cutest", but then I kept going "No, this one. No, this one. No..."
I couldn't pick one, so I picked all.

Jinx-kitty is so ready to cause chaos and I love it!  And Lulu-kitten about to bat at Pix.  These are the greatest.

But no KAT-arina?

KITTEN!
I've been trying to find more by this artist, but so far, I have only seen the ones up here.
Us kittens need to unite...
So Graves can't be a cat or have a cigar.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CQgIrywVEAAUWmZ.png

Yes he can!
You've gotta be fluffing kitten me right meow.
i'm starting a petition right meow!
{{champion:133}} {{item:3070}}
I feel that Quinn becoming a cat would come with a few... grisly side affects.

Hey all, Artist's twitter is https://twitter.com/duetlol?s=09. She's a really good artist who deserves to be credited!

Also, {{champion:18}}-cat best cat.

> [{quoted}](name=MrDweebus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WJZLamMw,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-12-04T18:11:16.923+0000)
>
> Hey all, Artist's twitter is https://twitter.com/duetlol?s=09. She's a really good artist who deserves to be credited!
> 
> Also, {{champion:18}}-cat best cat.

Thanks for that!

> [{quoted}](name=CopperKitten,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WJZLamMw,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2015-12-04T18:20:16.221+0000)
>
> Thanks for that!

Hi Rioter CopperKitten!

So, yeah, here's what I'm thinking.  The master plan is Riot commissions this artist to do cat versions of every champion in league, and you get the cat icon by getting level 10+ on your champion mastery.

Make it so!  Please, for the good of all league creation.

> [{quoted}](name=Velasan,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WJZLamMw,comment-id=001400000000,timestamp=2015-12-05T00:03:37.373+0000)
>
> Hi Rioter CopperKitten!
> 
> So, yeah, here's what I'm thinking.  The master plan is Riot commissions this artist to do cat versions of every champion in league, and you get the cat icon by getting level 10+ on your champion mastery.
> 
> Make it so!  Please, for the good of all league creation.

I'm pretty sure I'm not in a position to authorize that, but if I could I would Make It So and then have the entire collection at printed out my desk.  I'd have to earn every mastery.  I would League until my hands fell off to earn them.
If you do that, make figure versions as well, I would like to cover my desk in League cats.
{{champion:29}} Time to go.
He just had his stealth active.

Eh, might as well go all the way with this:
